Description: Transfer files using FTP, FTPS or SFTP.
Name: FTP

Methods.Name: Upload Delimited Text File
Methods.Description: Uploads a delimited text file to the (S)FTP server.

Methods.Name: Download Delimited Text File
Methods.Description: Downloads a delimited file from the (S)FTP server. Add columns as custom fields in the response, e.g. "[File].Email".

Methods.Name: Download File
Methods.Description: Downloads a file from the (S)FTP server.

Methods.Name: Move File
Methods.Description: Moves a file on the (S)FTP server.

Methods.Name: Upload File
Methods.Description: Uploads a file to the (S)FTP server.

Methods.Name: Delete File
Methods.Description: Deletes a file from the (S)FTP server.

Methods.Name: List Updated Files
Methods.Description: Gets files that have been updated in the directory.

Methods.Name: List Files
Methods.Description: Gets files from the directory tree.
